author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2426: change index term sort order to unicode code point order (used to be UTF16 order)

author: hwright
msg: Remove the last use of the svn_wc_entry_t from libsvn_client by adding a
custom node function to fetch the specific bits that info needs.  This
function should eventually be removed, as the API support is improved.
(build_info_for_entry): Use the custom function, rather than fetching an
entry and copying the specific bits out of it.

author: alally
msg: Branch for updating the parent-pom dependencies of all the projects to version 1, for testing the release candidates for those poms.

author: ffang
msg: [SMXCOMP-762]CxfBCComponet should be able to cache cxf buses across different cxf endpoint

author: marrs
msg: Relatively large refactoring of callback methods, cleaned up some code and made them more consistent.
